as he,spoke at an assembly last
year. His subject was the
methods used in keeping criminals records.

at Holy Cross this year. Aceeing
to Dean Francis X. Rowney, this is
the largest number ever to enroll in
the inititution. A freshman class of
385 also sets a record. The freshman class at Bowdoin numbers
about 150 students; Approximately
375 upperclassmen registered bringing the total about the 500 limit set
